text:
(Arguably) 2 of top 3 🇨🇦allies ordered large shipments of HCQ/CQ on limited, yet *promising, data: 

➡️ 🇫🇷 orders enough for 300K ppl
➡️ 🇺🇸 orders 3Mn 💊

Will we see same news here OR Health🇨🇦 & experts put out PR saying 'no evidence..."?
